info: Rating, 5 stars,  ¬∑ April 2024,  ¬∑ Stayed one night
rating_comment: This host is always reliable. We stayed in all their properties and this is probably the best one. Best location in Dhaka and the price is very reasonable considering its Gulshan. They have coffee machine, and all amenities for you to cook for 100 people. Apartment is very large with lots of private and cozy spaces to chill. Apartment is well furnished and very clean. There were other guests in other rooms but privacy was never an issue. There are many amaying restaurants nearby. We even went on a nice run along the Gulshan lake. German club is also next door. Very very safe neighbourhood. Gulshan can be big and the fact that this right in the centre of Gulshan 1 & 2, it makes everything even more amazing. highly recommend it espcially for foreignes and exapts.

Very budget friendly accomodation compairing with other hotels in Gulshan area , it‚Äôs a value for money homestay . You can shop food with local supermarket and foodpanda and save your time and money by cooking food and keep it in the refrigerator . Will stay again ..
